title: The Trading Post
description: An organic food shop with 5 acres of land used for growing fresh vegetables and a delicious variety of salad leaves which are certified with the Soil Association. Find a wide range of goods with a strong emphasis on supporting local producers. Directions: On the A303 to Exeter. At South Petherton roundabout take the exit signposted Lopen/Ilminster. Do not take the A303 Exeter/M5 Sign.
streetAddress: A303, Lopen Head, Yeovil, South Petherton, Somerse
